page.title: 04Children's games
page.content: We asked seven year olds what are their favourite games.Most liked{Tiggy or{Hide}and{Seek.}Some liked playing schools because they like their friends to play. The most interesting game is{Foxy Foxy 123.}One person is chosen to be Foxy. Foxy goes and stands at the wall. The other people are chickens and stand at a line. Foxy faces the wall and says "Foxy Foxy 123" to herself.If she sees anybody moving they will have to go and stand in a line touching the wall. If she doesn't see anybody move they have to try and touch the wall. When everybody is caught they will then just stay in a line. The chickens at each end have to touch hands, but if Foxy sees them move they will go back to the start. If they touch hands they shout "Foxy" and run. If Foxy catches any, that one is the new Foxy.
